title: Bank Relationships Manager
content:
BANK RELATIONSHIPS MANAGER
Current is a leading U.S. fintech serving people who have been overlooked by traditional banks with nearly 4 million members. Headquartered in NYC, our results-driven environment enables us to build better products, grow faster and empower everyone on our team to have an impact on our business and our mission to improve financial outcomes for our members.  
ABOUT THE ROLE:
As the Strategic Bank Relationships Manager you will oversee our mission-critical partnerships with financial institutions, partnering closely with our Product, Legal, Compliance teams to bring new initiatives to market that rely most heavily on strong relationships with our Banking partners. You will manage our day-to-day priorities and serve as the senior escalation point between our partners and the Current executive team.
RESPONSIBILITIES:

Lead day-to-day engagement with our bank partners to deliver against Current’s strategic priorities and deliver new innovative products for our members
Coordinate with cross-functional team members to ensure products meet bank partner requirements (regulatory, compliance, operational, customer service)
Be responsible for the end-to-end process with bank partners to review and approve new product development
Build strong cross functional relationships with our bank partners and internal stakeholders including Product, Compliance, Legal, Customer Experience, and Risk
Act as primary point of contact to drive internal discussions with stakeholders to address and incorporate bank partner feedback

ABOUT YOU:

Have expertise in the banking market and competitive landscape
Have deep familiarity with the regulatory landscape in banking, fintech, and financial services
Have strong relationship building skills, able to serve as an escalation point and drive complex topics to resolution
Have a consistent track record of driving alignment across multiple stakeholders, with the ability to handle diverse perspectives and goals in order to reach a timely resolution
Are driven by results and enjoy going above and beyond to execute on complex, fast paced projects under tight deadlines
Have 6+ years of work experience across any of:

Partnerships experience at a regulated Financial Services company
Experience working at or with a high growth Fintech startup


This role has a base salary range of $120,000- $175,000. Compensation is determined based on experience, skill level, and qualifications, which are assessed during the interview process. Current offers a competitive total rewards package which includes base salary, equity, and comprehensive benefits.
BENEFITS:

Competitive salary 
Meaningful equity in the form of stock options 
401(k) plan
Discretionary performance bonus program 
Biannual performance reviews
Medical, Dental and Vision premiums covered at 100% for you and your dependents 
Flexible time off and paid holidays 
Generous parental leave policy
Commuter benefits 
Fitness benefits
Healthcare and Dependent care FSA benefit 
Employee Assistance Programs focused on mental health 
Healthcare advocacy program for all employees 
Access to mental health apps 
Team building activities
Our modern Chelsea-based office with open floor plan, stocked kitchen, and catered lunches
